item.title: 波兰政策制定者希望格拉平斯基的鸽派倾向能持续下去
item.description: 波兰政策制定者路德维克-科特奇（Ludwik Kotecki）表示，他希望货币政策委员会能在 2025 年初开始降息，而且行长亚当-格拉平斯基（Adam Glapinski）不会强硬地发表最近较为鸽派的言论。【原文：Polish policymaker Ludwik Kotecki said he hopes the Monetary Policy Council will start reducing interest rates in early 2025 and that Governor Adam Glapinski won’t harden his recently more dovish rhetoric.】

item.title: 美国私募股权公司总裁家族收购约克城足球俱乐部
item.description: 私募股权公司 General Atlantic 首席执行官比尔-福特（Bill E Ford）的家族办公室已成为拥有 102 年历史的英格兰约克城足球俱乐部（York City FC）的重要小股东。【原文：The family office of Bill E Ford, the chief executive officer of private equity firm General Atlantic, has emerged as a significant minority shareholder in York City FC, a 102-year-old English football team.】

item.title: 花旗集团与阿波罗联手 250 亿美元推进私人信贷业务
item.description: 花旗集团和阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Citigroup Inc. and Apollo Global Management Inc. are teaming up in the fast-growing private credit market, agreeing to work together on $25 billion worth of deals over the next five years.】

item.title: 维珍媒体 O2 首席执行官确诊癌症后休假
item.description: 英国电信运营商维珍媒体 O2 首席执行官卢茨-许勒（Lutz Schüler）周四表示，在被诊断出患有前列腺癌后，将延长休假。【原文：Virgin Media O2 Chief Executive Officer Lutz Schüler is taking extended leave after being diagnosed with prostate cancer, the British telecom operator said on Thursday.】

item.title: 印度维持借贷，摩根大通银行的加入刺激了债务需求
item.description: 印度政府维持了本财年剩余时间的借贷计划，因为在全球债务包容的刺激下，外资流入强劲。【原文：India’s government maintained its borrowing plan for the remainder of this fiscal year amid robust foreign inflows spurred by global debt inclusion.】

item.title: Eskom 的涨价要求有望带来债券收益和客户压力
item.description: 南非 Eskom 控股有限公司（Eskom Holdings SOC Ltd.）正在寻求大幅提高电价，这对其债权人来说是个好消息，但对客户来说却是个痛苦，而且可能会影响该国的经济增长。【原文：South Africa’s Eskom Holdings SOC Ltd. is seeking a jumbo electricity price hike, spelling good news for its creditors but pain for customers and possible fallout for the country’s economic growth.】

item.title: 波兰亿万富翁家族纠纷引发 Cyfrowy 跌幅创纪录
item.description: Cyfrowy Polsat SA 的股价即将创下有史以来的最大单日跌幅，因为有报道披露，其亿万富翁创始人的家族内部正在争夺这家波兰媒体、能源和电信集团的控制权。【原文：Cyfrowy Polsat SA shares are on track for their largest daily loss ever after a report revealed infighting within the family of its billionaire founder over control of the Polish media, energy and telecoms group.】

item.title: 欧洲银行收购战加剧股东分红热潮
item.description: 欧洲银行正在承诺提高股东派息，因为潜在的兼并使其市场估值和提高回报的能力成为关注焦点。【原文：European banks are pledging higher shareholder payouts as potential mergers put a focus on their market valuations and ability to boost returns.】

item.title: 英国电影世界的重组在法庭上受到皇家地产的质疑
item.description: 电影世界的重组计划旨在削减公司的租金成本并避免破产，该计划正面临着来自业主的法庭挑战，业主们认为该计划对他们不公平。【原文：Cineworld’s restructuring plan, designed to slash the company’s rent costs and stave off insolvency, is facing a court challenge from landlords who argue the plan treats them unfairly.】

item.title: 推动人工智能飞跃气候问题
item.description:
很明显，没有足够的低碳能源来满足数据中心的需求，而天然气将是关键所在。【原文：

It’s become clear there’s not enough low-carbon energy to satisfy data centers’ needs, and natural gas will be key.

item.title: Mistry 委托德意志银行为印度最大的垃圾债券提供服务
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，亿万富翁 Shapoor Pallonji Mistry 控制的 Goswami Infratech Pvt.公司正在与德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）谈判，以筹集高达 250 亿卢比（约合 2.99 亿美元）的新债，用于支付印度最大的高收益卢比公司债券的债务。【原文：Goswami Infratech Pvt. , controlled by billionaire Shapoor Pallonji Mistry, is in talks with Deutsche Bank AG to raise as much as 25 billion rupees ($299 million) in new debt to pay dues on India’s biggest high-yield rupee corporate bond, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 贵金属反弹，白银飙升至 2012 年以来最高点
item.description: 由于对美联储进一步降息的预期有助于提振贵金属，白银创下 2012 年以来的新高。【原文：Silver hit the highest since 2012 as expectations for additional interest-rate cuts from the Federal Reserve help to boost precious metals.】

item.title: 育碧股价跌至十年新低后分析师发出警告
item.description: 育碧娱乐公司（Ubisoft Entertainment SA）的利润预警和游戏延迟发布，使这家法国视频游戏制造商的股价跌至十年来的最低点，引发了分析师们的异常批评。【原文：A profit warning and delayed game release from Ubisoft Entertainment SA that sent shares of the French video-game maker to a decade low has prompted an out-of-the-ordinary outburst of criticism from analysts.】

item.title: 大陆汽车制动器出现新问题，宝马召回更多汽车
item.description: 宝马汽车公司（BMW AG）在美国召回 270 辆汽车，以解决大陆集团（Continental AG）提供的制动系统焊接不当的问题，这是该部件出现更广泛问题后的又一次召回。【原文：BMW AG is recalling 270 vehicles in the US to fix improper welding on braking systems supplied by Continental AG, adding to a more widespread issue with the component.】

item.title: OpenAI 的穆拉提离职，更多高层领导退出初创公司
item.description: OpenAI 首席技术官米拉-穆拉提（Mira Murati）的意外离职，标志着这家高歌猛进的人工智能初创公司最新一次高层离职。但首先...【原文：The surprise departure of OpenAI Chief Technology Officer Mira Murati marks the latest high-level exit from the high-flying artificial intelligence startup. But first...】

item.title: 星巴克从多家门店撤下霍华德-舒尔茨钟爱的意大利糕点品牌
item.description: 星巴克公司（Starbucks Corp. ）将从其许多高端咖啡馆撤下 Princi 品牌的意大利烘焙食品，从而放弃了由长期领导人霍华德-舒尔茨（Howard Schultz）倡导的一项举措。【原文：Starbucks Corp. is removing the Princi brand of Italian baked goods from many of its higher-end cafes, stepping back from an initiative championed by longtime leader Howard Schultz.】

item.title: 特朗普寻求消除每天耗资 11.2 万美元的最大债务
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的律师们正在努力消除他最大的经济负担—；一项近 5 亿美元的欺诈判决，每天都在以约 10 万美元的速度飙升。【原文：Donald Trump’s lawyers are on a mission to wipe out his biggest financial liability — a nearly half-billion dollar fraud verdict that’s soaring by about $100,000 every day.】

item.title: Europastry 重启西班牙 IPO，估值 15 亿欧元
item.description: 烘焙公司 Europastry SA 在西班牙宣布首次公开募股计划近三个月后，市场波动阻止了其早些时候的上市尝试。【原文：Bakery firm Europastry SA announced plans for an initial public offering in Spain almost three months after market volatility halted an earlier attempt to go public.】

item.title: 即将上任的首席执行官施莱格尔表示，瑞士联合银行可能会采取更多宽松措施
item.description: 瑞士国家银行新任行长马丁-施莱格尔（Martin Schlegel）表示，瑞士国家银行可能会继续推行宽松政策。【原文：The Swiss National Bank is likely to continue along its easing path, according to its incoming president, Martin Schlegel.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。在中国宣布新的刺激措施后，全球股市上涨，而科技股将受益于美光的强劲预测。与此同时，石油在产量增加的前景下走低，交易员们在等待美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）的评论。以下是您需要了解的信息— Morwenna Coniam.【原文：Good morning. item.title: 耶伦为监管在增强金融稳定性中的作用辩护
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）为监管在支持有弹性的金融体系中的作用进行了辩护，她赞扬了财政部在过去几年中对确保稳定的重视。【原文：US Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen defended the role of regulation in supporting a resilient financial system as she touted her department’s focus over the past few years on securing stability.】

item.title: 纳斯达克将上市业务划分为不同区域以抓住需求
item.description: 纳斯达克公司（Nasdaq Inc. ）正在将其上市业务重组为三个地区分部，由高级管理人员领导，以努力捕捉当地首次公开募股的需求。【原文：Nasdaq Inc. is re-organizing its listing business into three regional divisions to be led by senior executives amid efforts to capture demand for initial public offerings at a local level.】

item.title: 贝莱德每年向桑坦德银行贷款投资 10 亿美元
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. ）每年将向桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）的能源和项目融资资产投资多达 10 亿美元，这标志着该基金管理公司今年在基础设施领域的扩张又迈出了一步。【原文：BlackRock Inc. will invest as much as $1 billion a year in energy and project finance assets from Banco Santander SA, signaling another step in the money manager’s growing expansion this year into infrastructure.】

item.title: 路透社报道：中国计划发行 2840 亿美元主权债务提振经济
item.description: 据路透社报道，中国计划在今年发行 2 万亿元人民币（合 2844.3 亿美元）的特别主权债券，因为政策制定者正在紧急推出一揽子刺激措施，以重振世界第二大经济体。【原文：China plans to issue 2 trillion yuan ($284.43 billion) of special sovereign bonds this year, Reuters reported, as policymakers unleash an urgent package of stimulus to revive the world’s No. 2 economy.】

item.title: 日产在雷诺重组中回购 5.51 亿美元股份
item.description: 日产汽车公司将从雷诺汽车公司回购价值 799 亿日元（5.51 亿美元）的股份，这是该公司与法国汽车制造商重新平衡联盟协议的一部分。【原文：Nissan Motor Co. will buy back ¥79.9 billion ($551 million) worth of its shares from Renault SA, part of an agreement to rebalance its alliance with the French carmaker.】

item.title: 阿达尼斥资数十亿美元开采铜矿的计划在矿业短缺中放缓
item.description: 由于全球矿石短缺限制了加工商的供应，高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）耗资 12 亿美元建造的铜冶炼厂将面临缓慢提升以达到铭牌产能的问题。【原文：Gautam Adani’s $1.2 billion copper smelter will face a slow ramp up to reach its nameplate capacity as a global shortfall of ore restricts supply to processors.】

item.title: 瑞士国家银行与财政部、Finma 共同制定银行抵押品规则
item.description: 瑞士国家银行正与政府及其金融监管机构 Finma 合作制定规则，允许该国所有银行以抵押品为条件从中央银行提取紧急流动资金。【原文：The Swiss National Bank is working with the government and its financial regulator Finma on rules that will allow all banks in the country to draw emergency liquidity from the central bank against collateral.】
